name: Sin Slayers: The First Sin
description: Sin Slayers is an RPG with roguelike elements set in a dark fantasy world, where your choices determine how challenging the fights and enemies will be. You have arrived in an unfamiliar place, where demons are kings. Find a way to get out of here or wander these lands endlessly.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: CPU 2100 MHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 210 or similar videocard DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: CPU 2400 MHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 210 or similar videocard DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
